member.name: T:Janus.Web.GridEX.ColumnSetNavigation
member.summary: Specifies how cell navigation is done in a row with column sets.

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.ColumnSetNavigation.Row
member.summary: When moving to the next cell, the cell in the same level of the active cell is selected. When the active cell is the last cell in a level, the first cell in the next level is selected.

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.ColumnSetNavigation.ColumnSet
member.summary: When moving to the next cell, the cell in the same level and the same column set of the active cell is selected. When the active cell is the last cell in a column set, the first cell in the next column set is selected.

member.summary: Cells that belong to a column with this setting will display an image from an URL and text.

member.name: T:Janus.Web.GridEX.ConditionOperator
member.summary: Specifies the comparison operation to perform.

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.ConditionOperator.Equal
member.summary: The condition is met when the value of the column attached to a format or filter condition is equal to the Value1 property.

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.ConditionOperator.NotEqual
member.summary: The condition is met when the value of the column attached to a format or filter condition is different than the Value1 property.

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.ConditionOperator.GreaterThan
member.summary: The condition is met when the value of the column attached to a format or filter condition is greater than the Value1 property.

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.ConditionOperator.LessThan
member.summary: The condition is met when the value of the column attached to a format or filter condition is less than the Value1 property.

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.ConditionOperator.GreaterThanOrEqualTo
member.summary: The condition is met when the value of the column attached to a format or filter condition is greater than or equal to the Value1 property.

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.ConditionOperator.LessThanOrEqualTo
member.summary: The condition is met when the value of the column attached to a format or filter condition is less than or equal to the Value1 property.

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.ConditionOperator.Between
member.summary: The condition is met when the value of the column attached to a format or filter condition is greater than or equal to the Value1 property and less than or equal to Value2 property.

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.ConditionOperator.NotBetween
member.summary: The condition is met when the value of the column attached to a format or filter condition is less than the Value1 property or greater than Value2 property.

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.ConditionOperator.Contains
member.summary: The condition is met when the Value1 property is a substring of the value of the column attached to a format or filter condition.

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.ConditionOperator.NotContains
member.summary: The condition is met when the Value1 property is not a substring of the value of the column attached to a format or filter condition.

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.ConditionOperator.BeginsWith
member.summary: The condition is met when the value of the column attached to a format or filter condition begins with the Value1 property.

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.ConditionOperator.EndsWith
member.summary: The condition is met when the value of the column attached to a format or filter condition ends with the Value1 property.

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.ConditionOperator.IsNull
member.summary: The condition is met when the value of the column attached to a format or filter condition is null (Nothing) or System.DBNull.

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.ConditionOperator.NotIsNull
member.summary: The condition is met when the value of the column attached to a format or filter condition is not null (Nothing) nor System.DBNull.

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.ConditionOperator.IsEmpty
member.summary: The condition is met when the value of the column attached to a format or filter condition is null (Nothing) or System.DBNull or an empty string.

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.ConditionOperator.NotIsEmpty
member.summary: The condition is met when the value of the column attached to a format or filter condition is not null (Nothing) nor System.DBNull nor an empty string.

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.ConditionOperator.In
member.summary: The condition is met when the value of the column attached to a format or filter condition is equal to at least one of the values in a list specified in Value1 property.

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.ConditionOperator.NotIn
member.summary: The condition is met when the value of the column attached to a format or filter condition is not equal to any of the values in a list specified in Value1 property.

member.summary: A header dragged from a column header row was dropped into the "group by" box and it is about to be inserted in the GridEXGroupCollection.

member.summary: A header dragged from the "group by" box was dropped outside the control or in a column header row and it is about to be removed from the GridEXGroupCollection.

member.name: T:Janus.Web.GridEX.GroupInterval
member.summary: Specifies how cell values are grouped.

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.GroupInterval.Default
member.summary: Groups are calculated using the option specified in the DefaultGroupInterval property of the column grouped.

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.GroupInterval.Value
member.summary: Groups are calculated using the values of the cell.

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.GroupInterval.Text
member.summary: Groups are calculated using the text of a cell. This setting is specially useful when grouping columns with ValueList or DropDowns that replace Id values for a text associated to it.

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.GroupInterval.Alphabetical
member.summary: Groups are calculated using only the first character of the text of a cell.

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.GroupInterval.Date
member.summary: Groups are calculated using only the date portion of a DateTime value. The time portion is ignored.

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.GroupInterval.Month
member.summary: Groups are calculated using only the month and year portions of a DateTime value. The day and time portions are ignored.

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.GroupInterval.Quarter
member.summary: Groups are calculated based using the quarter and year that a DateTime value belongs.

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.GroupInterval.Year
member.summary: Groups are calculated using only the year of a DateTime value. The month, day and time portions are ignored.

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.GroupInterval.Hour
member.summary: Groups are calculated using the date and the hour of a DateTime value. minutes and seconds are ignored.

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.GroupInterval.Minute
member.summary: Groups are calculated using the date, the hours and the minutes of a DateTime value. seconds are ignored.

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.GroupInterval.Second
member.summary: Groups are calculated using the date, the hours, the minutes and the second of a DateTime value.

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.GroupInterval.OutlookDates
member.summary: Groups are calculated in date periods based on the current date on the system like in Outlook 2003.

member.name: T:Janus.Web.GridEX.GroupMode
member.summary: Specifies the initial expanded/collapsed state of group rows.

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.GroupMode.Default
member.summary: No specified. The property will inherit its value from the parent object.

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.GroupMode.Expanded
member.summary: Specifies that all group rows will be expanded when groups are calculated.

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.GroupMode.Collapsed
member.summary: Specifies that all group rows will be collapsed when groups are calculated.

member.name: T:Janus.Web.GridEX.GroupRowVisualStyle
member.summary: Determines how group rows are drawn in GridEX control.

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.GroupRowVisualStyle.Standard
member.summary: Group rows are drawn using FormatStyle settings and with a standard height.

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.GroupRowVisualStyle.Outlook2003
member.summary: Group rows are drawn as in Outlook 2003 with a thick line at the bottom of the row and no group indents in the child rows.

member.name: T:Janus.Web.GridEX.CustomGroupType
member.summary: Determines the type of a custom group.

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.CustomGroupType.ConditionalGroupRows
member.summary: Groups are calculated using the GroupRows defined in the GridEXCustomGroup class (Each group row has a condition defined in it).

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.CustomGroupType.CompositeColumns
member.summary: Groups are calculated using the values of the columns defined in the CompositeColumns property.

member.name: T:Janus.Web.GridEX.GroupTotals
member.summary: Specifies how group total rows are displayed in a grouped grid.

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.GroupTotals.Default
member.summary: Undefined. The value of the property is inherited from the parent object.

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.GroupTotals.Never
member.summary: Groups don't have a group total row.

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.GroupTotals.Always
member.summary: Group total rows are displayed always, even if the group is collapsed.

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.GroupTotals.ExpandedGroup
member.summary: Group total rows are displayed only the group is expanded.

member.name: T:Janus.Web.GridEX.HeaderSelectorMode

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.HeaderSelectorMode.SelectAllRows
member.summary: Select the records in all the pages.

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.HeaderSelectorMode.SelectPage
member.summary: Select the records that are only in the current page.

member.name: T:Janus.Web.GridEX.HierarchicalGroupMode

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.HierarchicalGroupMode.ParentRows
member.summary: Only ParentRows in table are considered

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.HierarchicalGroupMode.AllRows
member.summary: All rows in table are considered and its hierarchy is broken.

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.HierarchicalGroupMode.AllRowsKeepHierarchy
member.summary: All rows in table are considered and its hierarchy is keeped.

member.summary: Index of the text used in the 'Today' button of the calendar dropdown.

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.GridEXBuiltInText.EmptyGridInfo
member.summary: Index of the text displayed in a grid when the control has no rows.

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.GridEXBuiltInText.OutlookDateEmpty
member.summary: Index of text for group row 'None' when GroupInterval.OutlookDates is used. 'None' group contains rows where the date value is empty.

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.GridEXBuiltInText.OutlookDateOlder
member.summary: Index of text for group row 'Older' when GroupInterval.OutlookDates is used. 'Older' group contains rows where the date value is less than the first day in the last month.

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.GridEXBuiltInText.OutlookDateLastMonth
member.summary: Index of text for group row 'Last Month' when GroupInterval.OutlookDates is used. 'Last Month' group contains rows where the date value is in the previous month.

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.GridEXBuiltInText.OutlookDateEarlierThisMonth
member.summary: Index of text for group row 'Earlier This Month' when GroupInterval.OutlookDates is used. 'Earlier This Month' group contains rows where the date value is in the current month and older than three weeks.

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.GridEXBuiltInText.OutlookDateThreeWeeksAgo
member.summary: Index of text for group row 'Three Weeks Ago' when GroupInterval.OutlookDates is used. 'Three Weeks Ago' group contains rows where the date value is three weeks older than current date in the system.

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.GridEXBuiltInText.OutlookDateTwoWeeksAgo
member.summary: Index of text for group row 'Two Weeks Ago' when GroupInterval.OutlookDates is used. 'Two Weeks Ago' group contains rows where the date value is two weeks older than current date in the system.

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.GridEXBuiltInText.OutlookDateLastWeek
member.summary: Index of text for group row 'Last Week' when GroupInterval.OutlookDates is used. 'Last Week' group contains rows where the date value is one week older than current date in the system.

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.GridEXBuiltInText.OutlookDateYesterday
member.summary: Index of text for group row 'Yesterday' when GroupInterval.OutlookDates is used. 'Yesterday' group contains rows where the date value is one day older than the current date in the system.

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.GridEXBuiltInText.OutlookDateToday
member.summary: Index of text for group row 'Today' when GroupInterval.OutlookDates is used. 'Today' group contains rows where the date value is equal to the current date in the system.

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.GridEXBuiltInText.OutlookDateTomorrow
member.summary: Index of text for group row 'Tomorrow' when GroupInterval.OutlookDates is used. 'Tomorrow' group contains rows where the date value is one day after the current date in the system.

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.GridEXBuiltInText.OutlookDateNextWeek
member.summary: Index of text for group row 'Next Week' when GroupInterval.OutlookDates is used. 'Next Week' group contains rows where the date value is one week after the current date in the system.

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.GridEXBuiltInText.OutlookDateTwoWeeksAway
member.summary: Index of text for group row 'Two Weeks Away' when GroupInterval.OutlookDates is used. 'Two Weeks Away' group contains rows where the date value is two weeks after the current date in the system.

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.GridEXBuiltInText.OutlookDateThreeWeeksAway
member.summary: Index of text for group row 'Three Weeks Away' when GroupInterval.OutlookDates is used. 'Three Weeks Away' group contains rows where the date value is three weeks after the current date in the system.

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.GridEXBuiltInText.OutlookDateLaterThisMonth
member.summary: Index of text for group row 'Later This Month' when GroupInterval.OutlookDates is used. 'Later This Month' group contains rows where the date value is in the current month and more than three weeks away.

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.GridEXBuiltInText.OutlookDateNextMonth
member.summary: Index of text for group row 'Next Month' when GroupInterval.OutlookDates is used. 'Next Month' group contains rows where the date value is in the next month.

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.GridEXBuiltInText.OutlookDateBeyondNextMonth
member.summary: Index of text for group row 'Beyond Next Month' when GroupInterval.OutlookDates is used. 'Beyond Next Month' group contains rows where the date value is greater than the last day in the next month.

member.name: T:Janus.Web.GridEX.InvalidValueAction
member.summary: Determines the behavior of the control when an invalid value has been entered by the user in a cell.

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.InvalidValueAction.Default
member.summary: Undefined. The value of the property will be inherited from the parent GridEX object.

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.InvalidValueAction.DiscardChanges
member.summary: Indicates that the control will discard the value entered by the user in a cell if an error occurs when the updating the cell.

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.InvalidValueAction.DiscardChangesAndShowErrorMessage
member.summary: Indicates that the control will discard the value entered by the user in a cell if an error occurs when the updating the cell. A message appears showing the error.

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.InvalidValueAction.Continue
member.summary: Indicates that the control will keep the value entered by the user in a cell if an error occurs when the updating the cell.

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.InvalidValueAction.ContinueAndShowErrorMessage
member.summary: Indicates that the control will keep the value entered by the user in a cell if an error occurs when the updating the cell. A message appears showing the error. This option can be used only when UpdateMode is UpdateMode.RowUpdate in the control.

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.InvalidValueAction.CancelUpdate
member.summary: Indicates that the control will halt the edition in a cell if an error occurs when the updating the cell.

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.InvalidValueAction.CancelUpdateAndShowErrorMessage
member.summary: Indicates that the control will halt the edition in a cell if an error occurs when the updating the cell. A message appears showing the error.

member.name: T:Janus.Web.GridEX.LogicalOperator
member.summary: Specifies the logical operator to use in a condition.

member.summary: Indicates that the condition is a simple condition or the root condition in a composite filter condition.

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.LogicalOperator.And
member.summary: Indicates that the condition must be evaluated using "And" as the logical conjunction operator with the previous condition in the collection.

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.LogicalOperator.Or
member.summary: Indicates that the condition must be evaluated using "Or" as the logical conjunction operator with the previous condition in the collection.

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.LogicalOperator.Xor
member.summary: Indicates that the condition must be evaluated using Xor as the logical conjuntion operator with the previous condition in the collection.

member.summary: Indicates the hierarchical data is in another child table.

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.HierarchicalMode.UseChildTables
member.summary: Tables defined in the ChildTables property are used to calculate child rows of a table.

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.HierarchicalMode.SelfReferencing
member.summary: Self referencing hierarchy constructed by the GridEXTable where, parent rows are calculated using ParentRootMode and ParentRootValue properties and child rows are the ones where the ChildMember property is equal to the ParentMember value of a row.

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.HierarchicalMode.SelfReferencingChildList
member.summary: Self referencing hierarchy. Child rows are retrieved from the list specified in the RetrievingChildSource event.

member.summary: Specifies how the Value of a NumericEdit control is edited.

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.NumericEditMode.FormattedText
member.summary: The formatted value will be used when the user start edition in a NumericEdit control.

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.NumericEditMode.Value
member.summary: The format is stripped from the value when the user start edition in a NumericEdit control.

member.name: T:Janus.Web.GridEX.NumericEditNullBehavior
member.summary: Specifies if nulls are allowed as the Value of a NumericEdit control.

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.NumericEditNullBehavior.AllowDBNull
member.summary: The Value property in a NumericEdit control can be set to DBNull.Value. If the user enters an empty string in the control it will be considered as DBNull.Value.

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.NumericEditNullBehavior.AllowNull
member.summary: The Value property in a NumericEdit control can be set to null (Nothing in Visual Basic). If the user enters an empty string in the control it will be considered as null.

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.NumericEditNullBehavior.NoNulls
member.summary: The Value property in a NumericEdit control can not be null not DBNull.Value. If the user enters an empty string in the control it will be considered as 0.

member.name: T:Janus.Web.GridEX.NumericEditValueType
member.summary: Specifies the Type of the Value returned by a NumericEdit control

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.NumericEditValueType.Byte
member.summary: Value will be returned as System.Byte data

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.NumericEditValueType.Decimal
member.summary: Value will be returned as System.Decimal data

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.NumericEditValueType.Double
member.summary: Value will be returned as System.Double data

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.NumericEditValueType.Int16
member.summary: Value will be returned as System.Int16 data

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.NumericEditValueType.Int32
member.summary: Value will be returned as System.Int32 data

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.NumericEditValueType.Int64
member.summary: Value will be returned as System.Int64 data

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.NumericEditValueType.SByte
member.summary: Value will be returned as System.SByte data

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.NumericEditValueType.Single
member.summary: Value will be returned as System.Single data

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.NumericEditValueType.UInt16
member.summary: Value will be returned as System.UInt16 data

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.NumericEditValueType.UInt32
member.summary: Value will be returned as System.UInt32 data

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.NumericEditValueType.UInt64

member.name: T:Janus.Web.GridEX.NumericEditFormatMask
member.summary: Specifies the FormatMask to be used in a NumericEdit control.

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.NumericEditFormatMask.General
member.summary: User can enter digits, decimal separators (if a non integral Type is used), positive and negative signs.

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.NumericEditFormatMask.Currency
member.summary: User can enter digits, digit group separators, decimal separators (if a non integral Type is used), positive and negative signs, parentheses and the currency symbol.

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.NumericEditFormatMask.Number
member.summary: User can enter digits, digit group separators, decimal separators (if a non integral Type is used), positive and negative signs.

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.NumericEditFormatMask.Percent
member.summary: User can enter digits, digit group separators, decimal separators (if a non integral Type is used), the percent symbol, positive and negative signs. If the percent symbol is entered by the user, the control will divide the number entered by 100.

member.name: T:Janus.Web.GridEX.RowCheckStateBehavior
member.summary: Specifies how rows are checked in a hierarchical or self referencing grid.

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.RowCheckStateBehavior.CheckIndividualRows
member.summary: Rows are checked as individual rows, checking a parent row does not check its child rows.

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.RowCheckStateBehavior.CheckStateDependsOnChild
member.summary: When a parent row is checked, all its child rows are checked too. In the same way, when all child rows of a parent are checked, its parent is checked automatically.

member.name: T:Janus.Web.GridEX.RowCheckState
member.summary: Specifies the checked state of a row.

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.RowCheckState.Checked
member.summary: The row is checked.

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.RowCheckState.Unchecked
member.summary: The row is unchecked.

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.RowCheckState.Mixed
member.summary: Some child rows are checked but not all. (Applies only when RowCheckStateBehavior.CheckStateDependsOnChild is used)

member.name: T:Janus.Web.GridEX.RowHeaderContent
member.summary: Specifies what is drawn in row headers.

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.RowHeaderContent.Default
member.summary: The value of the property is inherited from the parent object.

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.RowHeaderContent.RowHeaderText
member.summary: The row header shows the text specified in the RowHeaderText property of the GridEXRow.

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.RowHeaderContent.RowPosition
member.summary: The row header shows the position of the row.

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.RowHeaderContent.RowIndex
member.summary: The row header shows the position of the row in the grid. (Group rows are not included).

member.name: T:Janus.Web.GridEX.TextAlignment
member.summary: Specifies how the text is aligned in the object

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.TextAlignment.Left
member.summary: Text is aligned to the left.

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.TextAlignment.Right
member.summary: Text is aligned to the right.

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.TextAlignment.Center
member.summary: Text is centered.

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.TextAlignment.Justify
member.summary: Text is justified.

member.name: T:Janus.Web.GridEX.UpDownStyle
member.summary: Specifies the UpDownBase control style.

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.UpDownStyle.UpDownCombo
member.summary: The text portion is editable. The user can also click the up and down buttons change the value.

member.name: F:Janus.Web.GridEX.UpDownStyle.UpDownList
member.summary: The user cannot directly edit the text portion. The user must click the up and down buttons to change the value.

member.summary: Specifies that appearance related properties are persisted in the layout.
